summary: Frontend-only testing for B-CON Consulting iteration 2. Tested all 3 modifications (Blog hero text, Blog empty state with filters, About page new sections), Footer, and Legal pages. All 10 tested features PASS.

issues: Text in prose content may appear faded due to Tailwind Typography 'prose-slate' overriding the explicit text-[#1F2937] class. Actual contrast should be verified visually in production.

MODIFICAREA 1 — Blog subtitle: 'Analize, ghiduri și actualizări legislative pentru firme de construcții care derulează contracte publice.' ✓
MODIFICAREA 2 — Blog empty (no article cards displayed, API returns 0 articles) ✓

MODIFICAREA 3 — [data-testid='cost-comparison-intro'] exists with title 'Expertiză specializată, fără costurile unei angajări permanente' ✓

Legal page /termeni-si-conditii renders with navbar and footer ✓

Legal page /politica-cookies renders with navbar and footer ✓
Blog newsletter privacy link click navigates to /politica-confidentialitate ✓
critical_code_review_comments: Minor: In legal pages, the prose content uses both Tailwind Typography class 'prose-slate' and explicit text-[#1F2937]. These may conflict in rare cases. The explicit inline color class should take precedence, but worth verifying visually on production.
The placeholderPosts = [] pattern means if API is down, blog shows empty list rather than a user-friendly 'come back later' message. Consider adding a more informative error state for API failures.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 3 modifications from iteration 2 have been fully tested and confirmed working. Blog is empty (no hardcoded articles), About page has all new sections with correct data-testids, colors and texts. Footer 4-column structure with DAB Nexus data confirmed. Legal pages all render correctly. Site is in Romanian. Preview URL: https://bcon-consulting.preview.emergentagent.com
